title: NSW Health admits disease circulating in community as outbreak, exposure sites grow
desc: "Other people may have been unknowingly exposed," NSW Health has warned.

title: ‘The Napa Boys’, ‘Idiotka’, Elvis Presley Doc Expands
desc: 'The Napa Boys’, ‘Idiotka’, 'Dreams' & an interactive anime film are new indie releases. ‘Elvis Presley In Concert’, 'The President's Cake' expand.

title: KeNHA disowns fake Murang’a Highway eviction notice circulating online
desc: Traders warned not to fall for the viral clearance notice.

desc: MELAKA, Feb 28 — Three teenagers died while another was seriously injured in an accident involving three motorcycles on Jalan Tambak Paya, in Melaka Tengah district, early this...

title: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un presents sniper to daughter Kim Ju Ae amid succession speculations
desc: North Korea has unveiled images of Kim Jong Un's daughter, Ju Ae, firing a rifle, fueling speculation about her succession. State media reported Kim gifted new sniper rifles at a party event, indicating Ju Ae may be training for a leadership role.

title: CGTN: How China's path of democracy safeguards people's rights and interests
desc: Ahead of China's annual key political meetings - the Two Sessions, CGTN published an article elaborating how China's whole-process people's democracy works at the grassroots level and how it safeguards the rights and interests of the people. Through a comprehensive introduction of China's democratic practice, the article stresses that this approach fosters broad and continuous participation, ensuring that governance decisions reflect the collective will and evolving needs of society.

title: Pride in Protest float excluded from Sydney Mardi Gras over 'offensive' comments about Jewish LGBTQ group
desc: Mardi Gras organisers have issued a formal warning to Pride in Protest on Friday morning, stating they had breached the parade's terms and conditions.

title: Prochazka-Ulberg title bout set for UFC 327; Pereira vacates belt
desc: The UFC announced a vacant light heavyweight title bout between Jiri Prochazka and Carlos Ulberg at UFC 327, meaning former champ Alex Pereira has vacated his belt.
